name: Slappy Burd
description:
Finally updated for itch.io :)

You can practice in the TUTORIAL from the main menu.

MOBILE:

Tap each corner of the screen for the different moves.

INSTRUCTIONS--

KEYBOARD:

Q/P - Left Punch / Right Punch

Z/. - Left Kick / Right Kick

------ OR ------

NUMERIC PAD:

7 / 9 - Left Punch / Right Punch

1 / 3 - Left Kick / Right Kick
